Machine.title: Machine
Machine.explanation: Specifies the target machine type, indicating the architecture for which the executable is intended.

TimeDateStamp.title: TimeDateStamp
TimeDateStamp.explanation: Represents the time and date when the file was created or last modified.

NumberOfSections.title: NumberOfSections
NumberOfSections.explanation: Indicates the number of sections present in the executable file.

SizeOfOptionalheader.title: SizeOfOptionalheader
SizeOfOptionalheader.explanation: Specifies the size of the optional header in bytes.

Magic.title: Magic
Magic.explanation: Denotes the format of the optional header. Different values indicate different header formats (e.g., PE32 or PE32+).

MajorLinkerVersion.title: MajorLinkerVersion
MajorLinkerVersion.explanation: Specifies the major version number of the linker used to create the executable.

MinorLinkerVersion.title: MinorLinkerVersion
MinorLinkerVersion.explanation: Specifies the minor version number of the linker used.

SizeOfCode.title: SizeOfCode
SizeOfCode.explanation: Indicates the total size of all code sections, measured in bytes.

SizeOfInitializedData.title: SizeOfInitializedData
SizeOfInitializedData.explanation: Specifies the total size of initialized data sections, measured in bytes.

SizeOfUninitializedData.title: SizeOfUninitializedData
SizeOfUninitializedData.explanation: Indicates the total size of uninitialized data sections, measured in bytes.

EntryPoint.title: EntryPoint
EntryPoint.explanation: Specifies the address of the entry point where execution begins.

BaseOfCode.title: BaseOfCode
BaseOfCode.explanation: Specifies the starting address of the code section within the image.

ImageBase.title: ImageBase
ImageBase.explanation: Specifies the preferred base address of the image when loaded into memory.

SectionAlignment.title: SectionAlignment
SectionAlignment.explanation: Defines the alignment of sections in memory, specifying the boundary on which sections are aligned.

FileAlignment.title: FileAlignment
FileAlignment.explanation: Specifies the alignment of sections in the file on disk.

MajorOperatingSystemVersion.title: MajorOperatingSystemVersion
MajorOperatingSystemVersion.explanation: Denotes the major version number of the operating system required to run the executable.

MinorOperatingSystemVersion.title: MinorOperatingSystemVersion
MinorOperatingSystemVersion.explanation: Denotes the minor version number of the operating system required.

MajorImageVersion.title: MajorImageVersion
MajorImageVersion.explanation: Specifies the major version number of the image.

MinorImageVersion.title: MinorImageVersion
MinorImageVersion.explanation: Specifies the minor version number of the image.

Checksum.title: Checksum
Checksum.explanation: Contains a checksum of the image for error checking. A value of 0 often indicates it's not used.

MajorSubsystemVersion.title: MajorSubsystemVersion
MajorSubsystemVersion.explanation: Denotes the major version number of the subsystem required to run the executable.

MinorSubsystemVersion.title: MinorSubsystemVersion
MinorSubsystemVersion.explanation: Denotes the minor version number of the subsystem required.

SizeOfImage.title: SizeOfImage
SizeOfImage.explanation: Specifies the total size of the image, including all sections, when loaded into memory.

SizeOfHeader.title: SizeOfHeader
SizeOfHeader.explanation: Indicates the size of the header section.

Subsystem.title: Subsystem
Subsystem.explanation: Specifies the type of subsystem required to run the executable, such as a console or graphical user interface.

SizeOfStackReserve.title: SizeOfStackReserve
SizeOfStackReserve.explanation: Denotes the size of the stack reserved for the application.

SizeOfStackCommit.title: SizeOfStackCommit
SizeOfStackCommit.explanation: Specifies the amount of memory initially committed for the stack.

SizeOfHeapReserve.title: SizeOfHeapReserve
SizeOfHeapReserve.explanation: Indicates the size of the heap reserved for the application.

SizeOfHeapCommit.title: SizeOfHeapCommit
SizeOfHeapCommit.explanation: Specifies the amount of memory initially committed for the heap.

NumberOfRvaAndSizes.title: NumberOfRvaAndSizes
NumberOfRvaAndSizes.explanation: Indicates the number of data directories in the optional header.
